summary:
An orc who is childish and has a fetish for pinching people's nipples...
She lost all of her hair by trying to gain respect from the long lost race of Nippolus, and now she is the last of her kind a long with 2 others who have been seen in the drunken huntsmen in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[center][s]﻿[/s][/center]An orc who is childish and has a fetish for pinching people's nipples...
She lost all of her hair by trying to gain respect from the long lost race of Nippolus, and now she is the last of her kind a long with 2 others who have been seen in the drunken huntsmen in Whiterun. 

[color=#ff0000]Note [/color][color=#ff7700]this is an Follower, but there is also an NPC version if you only want that.
This is still undergoing improvement but i have updated with a quick version so people can get a follower version (now with 3 followers).
Two of the 3 followers' heads are now normal and if they aren't please explain the situation in the post section :)


[/color][color=#ffff00]Thanks to Fatkmann for making the interesting back-story for the Nipple Twister :)[/color]
author: Cobra12345
